securitygame

Class AttackerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • securitygame.AttackerHelper

  • public class AttackerHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliary class for creating .attack files. Attacker will use the three parameter constructor and combination of the two attack methods and the four probe methods to generate an .attack file. Have Attacker remember to call close() when finished for safety. Game Master will use the two parameter constructor for parsing original network and attacker file to generate the attacker's visible network and history. Actions deemed invalid will be charged the Parameters.INVALID_RATE value.
